author: Cameron Wilson
title: Climate Deniers Are Making Memes About The Coronavirus Outbreak To Argue Against Urgent Climate Action
description: Right wing media figures and groups are using the wall-to-wall coverage of COVID-19 to claim there was never any need for urgent climate action. View Entire Post ›
content:
The journalists at BuzzFeed News are proud to bring you trustworthy and relevant reporting about the coronavirus. To help keep this news free, become a member and sign up for our newsletter, Outbreak Today.
